item.title: Managing My Motivation, as a Solo Dev
item.description: One of the biggest sticking points of being a solo dev is maintaining motivation. I&rsquo;ve been keeping a journal entry about how to hack my motivation, what works and what doesn&rsquo;t. Here are the things that have worked. Convert external sources to motivation I&rsquo;ve always known that I&rsquo;m more extrinsically than intrinsically motivated, so I have a couple systems that help to give me bursts of external motivation. For example, the Money Bots, which pop up every time someone subscribes.
